Title: Portfolio Site
Description: This is my second big project using Django, and it has really opened the door to python for me. Since starting this project, I have been in love with the language.

Title: Snake In C
Description: This is the game Snake in C, which I made with a partner for a Systems Programming class assignment.
ImageAlt: Animated gif of the snake game.

Title: Java Game
Description: This is a game made in Java by a team of four students including myself. There was some code I wrote for the 'enemy' shapes that didn't make the cut for the final deadline. However, I did write the score system as can be seen in the singleton above.
ImageAlt: Animated gif of the shooter game.

Title: News Site
Description: This news site was made with Django. While I primarily worked on the HTML and CSS on this project, I did know about and work on the python with my project partner.
